name: listFilter
description: Used to filter an list to items for which the closure function returns true.

params.name: function
params.description: Inline closure function executed for each element in the list. Returns true if the list element should be included in the filtered list. Support for passing the original list to the closure function added in CF11 Update 5.

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have

examples.title: Example using a simple numeric comparison
examples.description: Take list and use List Filter to return items that are 3 and higher.

examples.title: Example using a member function
examples.description: This is the same example as above, but using a member function on the list instead of a standalone function.
